Text:
I wasn't expecting Ghost Lab today, thanks a bunch. You've done a awesome job this weekend, as always.

Keep uo the great work
I know there's still that 2x09 episode Science Channel aired this past Wednesday.  But I am getting this series through a VoD service and might have to wait until next week to get it.
Great as always....love you man!  I'll help seed.

Jeez, the switch over to Science Channel really screwed things up.  I know that now there is two episodes you are all wanting to get, but I don't have a DVR or TV card and have to go about the slow road and wait for the VOD to have them available.  
Many apologies for such delays.
I don't know if you'll catch it, but e09 is airing tonight on Discovery.
